explanation: Multiple traders mention BTC breakouts, scalping opportunities, and bullish momentum on both short (1m, 5m, 15m) and longer (4h, daily) timeframes. Key breakout levels (107714.99 long entry from Marticlues AI) have been triggered, and several community members discuss BTC pumping, holding, and keeping longs open. While some resistance is noted near 108k-108.5k, overall sentiment, especially among those using real trades and discussing high-confidence strategies, is that BTC remains a buy with strong potential for further upside. The presence of large buy orders, positive scalping talk, and consistent references to breakouts and support holding strengthen the bullish case.
